file.name: swagger.json
file.content: {"openapi": "3.0.0", "servers": [{"description": "Development", "url": "http://localhost:5000/api/v1"}], "info": {"description": "Basic read-only API for Mother Tongues dictionaries", "version": "1.0.0", "title": "Mother Tongues Dictionary API", "license": {"name": "Apache 2.0", "url": "http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"}}, "tags": [{"name": "languages", "description": "Fetch language data"}], "paths": {"/languages": {"get": {"tags": ["languages"], "summary": "searches inventory", "operationId": "searchInventory", "description": "By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for\navailable languages\n", "parameters": [{"in": "query", "name": "available", "description": "show available languages", "required": false, "schema": {"type": "boolean"}}, {"in": "query", "name": "only-config", "description": "only show config from specified language", "required": false, "schema": {"type": "boolean"}}, {"in": "query", "name": "only-data", "description": "only show data from specified language", "required": false, "schema": {"type": "boolean"}}, {"name": "name", "in": "query", "description": "slug ID (tag) of specified languages", "required": false, "schema": {"$ref": "#/components/schemas/LanguageTags"}}], "responses": {"200": {"description": "search results matching criteria"}, "400": {"description": "bad input parameter"}}}}}, "components": {"schemas": {"LanguageTags": {"type": "string", "enum": ["danish", "test"]}}}}
